text: ReplaceableI m sitting here in my room  and it s so messy and so chaotic  like everything around me  It s such it s own world in here  But at the same time  None of it feels real  This room doesn t feel real  My skin doesn t feel real  my hands  my face  my clothes  the air  nothing  It all feels like I m experiencing it through a stained glass or like I m being dragged underwater  It s all hazy and foggy and I can t  swim out of it  Medicine  It s stopped working  Alcohol doesn t numb it anymore  Hurting myself doesn t work anymore  No matter how many times I do it  no matter how much further and further I push myself   Nothing feels real   And I don t have anyone to talk to  My parents have enough on their plate  My friends have all left  or only vent to me  and I m never allowed to speak about my problems   All I want to do is cry  But about what  How empty everything is  How numb I am  How much I hate myself  I don t even have the words to describe it  Doesn t that make it sound fake   Honestly  what s the point of continuing when you have no reason to  No love  no friendship  everything about me is easily replaceable  Replaceable  That s all I am and all I ever will be  Replaceable
summary: Everything is messy and chaotic in my room, but none of it feels real. I don't have anyone to talk to, my parents have enough on their plate, my friends have all left or only vent to me and I'm never allowed to speak about my problems.

text: Doc  Logical thinking All of my life I ve been taught order and discipline when in turn  life is utter chaos and mayhem  I ve always tried to be good  not to hurt anyone physically or mentally and in turn I ve gotten hurt  I ve watched people do things I wasn t supposed to do and sure  most of the times they d get caught and punished  I ve always thought that those people would not progress in life just because of that kind of behavior  but this isn t a movie isn t it  it s real life  The very same people that used to make my growing up harder are now living a more fulfilled life than me  With friends  girlfriends  jobs  money  cars  The list goes on  So  what s the deal  Where s my reward for leading a disciplined life  Here you go  cancer for you and a hot girlfriend and money for your bully  Seems right  This is what happens in puberty in my opinion  It is then when you burst your bubble and realize that it won t be always sunny  heck  it rains shit most of the time   When you think about it  everything is for nothing   Nothing  has a big point  a reason   It s  not existing because you were good or bad   It  is because it is  The true enlightenment brings doom instead of bliss  Our very existence is the result of a very lucky random coincidences  Not because of some divine being s will  That s actually why people invented religion  not to go mad  to give purpose to their lives  A false purpose  We are all just animals  and our sentience is a mistake in evolution s steps  Our core reason to be alive  as stupid as it sounds  is to reproduce  That s it  Everything on the side is there to fill up time until the next fuck because we have evolved so far up to double our life expectancy in just the last   years  Everything I do  everything everyone does  doesn t matter  We are all going to die eventually  and so are our children and grandchildren and so on  So why  Why bother
summary: According to Doc Logical thinking, everything is for nothing. People who used to make his growing up harder are now living a more fulfilled life than him. Everything I do doesn't matter, because we are all going to die eventually.
cleaned: accord doc logical thinking people grow hard live fulfilled life not matter go die eventually

text: School is going back in person   BIG TW  My school is a vocational school  Every other week switches between a week of nothing but your selected shop class  and a week of general academics  We refer to them as Shop Week and Academic Week   Creative  I know  I have been bullied since second grade  every friend has left at the start of the new school year  every group I m in excludes me  etc  In middle school  I was abused by my first  now  ex boyfriend  and was bullied to the point of four attempted suicides by him and my  best friend  who I ve known since elementary  my other friend I ve known since childhood has grown up to be a total fucking dickweed  and his friends are no better  Our school had Academic Week online  but now they re trying to reset everything  They want us to go in   days  instead of   like they were doing  and permanently in person  They put out a thing on their website  saying you could fill out a survey to stay at home and do classes from the computer while the teacher runs their class from in the room with the other kids  but my parents aren t having it  I usually don t care about little things like this  as due to my disability I cannot understand most major things happening  However  due to my past experiences  my PTSD  and my  albeit mild  Agoraphobia  I can t do this  I can t go back  I don t have the strength  My classmates don t like me  my friends are terrible  and I m  just not strong enough  My parents keep saying  it s just a few more weeks  and even though my grades took a minor hit due to not being able to focus  my fibromyalgia has gone down due to not leaving the house  I m not afraid to sit with my back away from the wall  because I know I m safe  I can t do these things at school  I need to sit in the back and my fibromyalgia gets so bad that I miss days due to not being able to get out of bed  I m honestly just terrified
summary: Big TW's school is going back in person for Academic Week. Big TW has been bullied since second grade. She has PTSD and Agoraphobia. Her parents want her to stay at home and do classes from the computer while the teacher runs the class.
cleaned: big school go person academic week big bully second grade pt agoraphobia parent want stay home class computer teacher run class
